recipe.title: How to Make Coconut Macaroons
recipe.intro: Coconut macaroons are easy to make. They are chewy inside and crispy outside. They are perfect with a cup of tea!
recipe.ingredients: desiccated coconut, sweetened condensed milk, egg whites, vanilla extract, salt, dark chocolate (optional)
steps: **Preheat** the oven to 160 degrees Celsius. **Line** a baking tray with baking paper.
**Mix** the desiccated coconut, condensed milk, vanilla extract, and salt in a bowl.
**Whisk** the egg whites in a clean bowl until they form soft peaks.
**Fold** the egg whites gently into the coconut mixture.
**Scoop** small balls of the mixture onto the baking tray. **Leave** space between each one.
**Bake** for 20 to 25 minutes until the tops are golden. **Let** them cool. **Dip** the bottoms in melted dark chocolate if you like!

review.text: I discovered The Lillipad CafÃ© in Edge Hill. It is a quiet little cafÃ© surrounded by tropical gardens. I ordered a pot of green tea and two coconut macaroons. The macaroons were amazing! They were golden and crispy on the outside but soft and chewy inside. The chocolate on the bottom was a nice surprise. The garden seating is so relaxing. I could hear birds singing in the trees. A perfect afternoon escape from the city!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"The chocolate on the bottom was a nice surprise."

lines.speaker: James
lines.text: Hi! Do you sell any sweets that I can take home as a gift?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, we do! We have coconut macaroons in a gift box. They are very popular.

lines.speaker: James
lines.text: Oh, they look lovely! How many are in a box?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: There are six in a small box and twelve in a large box.

lines.speaker: James
lines.text: I will take the large box, please. My mum loves coconut.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Great choice! These ones have dark chocolate on the bottom too.

lines.speaker: James
lines.text: Even better! How long do they last?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: They stay fresh for about five days in a cool place.

lines.speaker: James
lines.text: Perfect. Can you wrap it as a gift, please?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course! I will put a ribbon on it. That is eighteen dollars for the large box.

lines.speaker: James
lines.text: Brilliant, thank you! My mum will be so happy.

quiz3.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"My mum loves coconut." "My mum will be so happy."

part_a.full_text: What should we make for the party? How about coconut macaroons? Good idea! They are easy to make. Do we need eggs? Yes, we need egg whites. How many? Three egg whites should be enough. What about coconut? We need two cups of desiccated coconut. OK, I will go to the shop now. Thanks! I will clean the kitchen.

part_b.full_text: Thank you for visiting our cafÃ©! Would you like to join our loyalty card programme? It is free to join. Every time you buy a coffee or a sweet treat, you earn one stamp. When you collect ten stamps, you get a free coffee or a free macaroon. The card is valid for six months from the date you join. You can also get double stamps on Wednesdays. Just show your card when you order. It is a great way to enjoy your favourite cafÃ© treats for less!

try_it.example: Last week I made coconut macaroons for my friend. I put them in a nice box with a ribbon. She was very happy and said they were delicious!
